name: Levantera: Tale of The Winds
description: Get ready to set sail! You are the captain of the M.S. Tradewind, a trade ship bound for the open sea! Gather your crew, test your sea readiness, and explore the world in this 8-bit action/RPG inspired by NES classics.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel or AMD CPU Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Onboard DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU DirectX: Version 9.0
